meanings.definition: A gift or present given to someone.
meanings.sent1: I received a pressie from my friend on my birthday.
meanings.sent2: She wrapped the pressie in colorful paper and a bow.
meanings.sent3: The pressie from my grandma made me smile.
meanings.sent4: The pressie was a ray of sunshine on a gloomy day.
meanings.sent5: The pressie was so thoughtful, it brought tears to my eyes.

meanings.definition: To give a gift or present to someone.
meanings.sent1: I will pressie my sister with a book for her graduation.
meanings.sent2: They decided to pressie their parents with a surprise anniversary party.
meanings.sent3: I pressie my dog with treats to see his happy dance.
meanings.sent4: She pressied her best friend with a handmade bracelet.
meanings.sent5: Pressie your loved ones with kindness every day.
